abstract: New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton urges police officers not to turn their backs when Mayor Bill de Blasio appears at funeral of Police Officer Wenjian Liu, who was gunned down along with his partner Rafael Ramos in Brooklyn in December 2014; De Blasio is scheduled to deliver eulogy at Liu's funeral.
lead_paragraph: Police Commissioner William J. Bratton urged New York City officers not to demonstrate antagonism when Mayor Bill de Blasio appears at the service for an officer who was killed on duty.
snippet: Police Commissioner William J. Bratton urged New York City officers not to demonstrate antagonism when Mayor Bill de Blasio appears at the service for an officer who was killed on duty.

headline.main: No Turned Backs at Officer Liu’s Funeral, Bratton Asks
headline.print_headline: No Turned Backs at Funeral, Bratton Asks
